9f4e0cf4-caa0-472a-80ff-bb241f257275.description: Earners of the Sigma Catalog Fundamentals badge have an understanding of how functional, technical and resource specifications are designed and implemented within the Sigma Catalog. They know and have demonstrated a range of product lifecycle management tasks and are able to launch and publish entities from Sigma Catalog to external systems.
9f4e0cf4-caa0-472a-80ff-bb241f257275.name: Sigma Catalog Fundamentals Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Sigma Catalog Fundamentals online course or instructor-led course.  This included the following topics:  business benefits of using a catalog-based system; navigating the catalog; building and editing entities; pricing and overrides; product lifecycle management; applying product rules and modelling for external systems.
Successfully completed the Sigma Catalog Fundamentals Certification exam.  This is a time-limited three hour exam which consists of 50 multiple choice questions, 10 practical tasks and an essay.

ec6c5c14-8cc7-4dc3-ac40-ba5914753808.description: Earners of the Hansen Catalog Fundamentals badge have an understanding of how functional, technical and resource specifications are designed and implemented within the Hansen Catalog using TM Forum modelling best practices. They know and have demonstrated a range of product lifecycle management tasks and are able to launch and publish entities from Hansen Catalog to external systems.
ec6c5c14-8cc7-4dc3-ac40-ba5914753808.name: Hansen Catalog Fundamentals Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Catalog Fundamentals online course or instructor-led course.  This included the following topics:  business benefits of using a catalog-based system; navigating the catalog; building and editing entities; pricing and overrides; product lifecycle management; applying product rules and modelling for external systems.
Successfully completed the Hansen Catalog Fundamentals Certification exam.  This is a time-limited three hour exam which consists of 50 multiple choice questions and 3 scenario tasks.

6bcfe40d-0ce7-4aa4-b51b-73f3a682ec48.description: Earners of the Hansen CPQ Fundamentals Certified badge have demonstrated a good understanding of the Hansen CPQ quotation process. They have created, configured and reviewed quotes and orders within the application before submitting them to an order management system. They have also demonstrated the use of Hansen CPQ to amend a customer's product portfolio, and to amend live orders.
6bcfe40d-0ce7-4aa4-b51b-73f3a682ec48.name: Hansen CPQ Fundamentals Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen CPQ Fundamentals online course or instructor-led course.  This included the following topics:  customer selection and offer filtering; creating, configuring, reviewing and submitting quotes; checking for potential errors in the quote; guided selling; amending the customer portfolio; amending existing quotes; and amending live orders.
Successfully completed a three hour exam consisting of a multiple choice section followed by scenario-based practical tasks relating to everyday use of Hansen CPQ.

6366c890-73c2-4641-b629-2bc979d0f9cd.description: Earners of the Sigma Catalog Configuration Certified badge have a good understanding of the Sigma Catalog solution architecture and options for integrating with third party systems, including the use of Sigma Catalog Services. They have demonstrated a range of skills including configuration and extension of the underlying data structure and user interface, development of security roles and role-based views, and configuration of test and launch environments.
6366c890-73c2-4641-b629-2bc979d0f9cd.name: Sigma Catalog Configuration Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Sigma Catalog Configuration online course or instructor-led course.  This included the following topics:  Sigma Catalog Solution Architecture (data, application, integration and deployment); Sigma Catalog Services; and Sigma Workbench (business hierarchy configuration; schema classes, templates and views; configuring publication of data and test environments; administering role-based security).
Successfully completed the Sigma Catalog Fundamentals Certification exam.  This is a time-limited three hour exam which consists of 50 multiple choice questions and 9 practical tasks.

c6583d00-c52d-45da-b49a-60df81d46f09.description: Earners of the Hansen OM Fundamentals badge have an understanding of managing orders, user tasks and fall-out using the run-time user interface. They have demonstrated a range of skills including taking appropriate actions for an order when in fallout or when the order requires manual intervention. They are competent in order tracking and handling, order cancellation, force closing of the order, managing error handling and managing the environment configuration.
c6583d00-c52d-45da-b49a-60df81d46f09.name: Hansen OM Fundamentals Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen OM Fundamentals Certification course. This included the following topics: purpose and scope of the Hansen OM run-time user interface; run-time user interface actors; run-time user interface actions on orders; run-time user interface actions on user tasks; task demonstrations and practical exercises.

Successfully completed the Hansen OM Fundamentals Certification exam. This 3 hour exam consists of a set of multiple choice questions followed by scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

3d0bb681-bac2-4f42-8f21-380c0072e0ce.description: Hansen OM Certified Configurators can design business processes using BPMN extended constructs from the Hansen Order Management design time user interface. They know and have demonstrated a range of skills in managing the domain configuration including managing releases, creating domain entities such as fulfillment systems, workgroups, fulfillment tasks, user tasks, subprocesses, assessment processes and fulfillment processes as required by the business.
3d0bb681-bac2-4f42-8f21-380c0072e0ce.name: Hansen OM Certified Configurator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen OM Configuration Certification course. This included the following topics: business process modelling concepts, managing releases, importing product specifications, managing work groups, managing fulfilment systems, managing fulfilment tasks, managing user tasks, managing sub processes, managing assessment process, managing fulfilment processes, task demonstrations and practical exercises.
Successfully completed the Hansen OM Configuration Certification exam. This consisted of a multiple-choice theory test followed by a set of scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

765ee80c-d775-4fba-bc84-1b056ee77bc5.description: Hansen Catalog Certified Configurators have a good understanding of the Hansen Catalog solution architecture and options for integrating with third party systems, including the use of Hansen Catalog Services. They have demonstrated a range of skills including configuration and extension of the underlying data structure and user interface, development of security roles and role-based views, and configuration of test and launch environments.
765ee80c-d775-4fba-bc84-1b056ee77bc5.name: Hansen Catalog Configurator Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Catalog Configuration online course or instructor-led course.  This included the following topics:  Hansen Catalog Solution Architecture (data, application, integration and deployment); Hansen Catalog Services; and Hansen Workbench (business hierarchy configuration; schema classes, templates and views; configuring publication of data and test environments; administering role-based security).

Successfully completed the Hansen Catalog Configurator Certification exam.  This is a time-limited three hour exam which consists of a multiple choice section followed by a series of scenario-based practical tasks.

322a81ab-1622-45ed-9d8d-0b24143072ff.description: Earners of the Hansen CPQ Certified Developer badge have a good understanding of the Hansen CPQ solution architecture and options for integrating with third party systems. They have demonstrated the Hansen CPQ plugin development process alongside a range of skills including configuring and overriding functionality within the CPQ Client.
322a81ab-1622-45ed-9d8d-0b24143072ff.name: Hansen CPQ Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen CPQ Developer course.  This course consisted of three modules:  Solutions Architecture (the software elements in the Hansen CPQ solution and implementation best practices); Client Developer, (practical skills required to configure and override the appearance and functionality of your CPQ Client); and Plugin Developer (installation, editing, testing and fault fixing of key Hansen CPQ plugins).
Successfully completed the Hansen CPQ Certified Developer exam.  This 3 hour exam consisted of a multiple-choice section and a number of scenario-based practical tasks.

4f43a0d3-5104-4531-b49b-b5abce746bb9.description: Earners of the Hansen Provision Fundamentals badge are able to manage and troubleshoot the day to day order operations within the Hansen Provision application. They are confident in navigating the Hansen Provision Operations user interface, managing and troubleshooting orders,' and investigating workflows using the Workflow Console.
4f43a0d3-5104-4531-b49b-b5abce746bb9.name: Hansen Provision Fundamentals Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Provision Fundamentals Certification course.  This included the following topics:  navigating the Hansen Provision Operations user interface; managing and troubleshooting orders; and investigating workflows using the Workflow Console.

Successfully completed the Hansen Provision Fundamentals Certification exam.  This 3 hour exam consists of a set of multiple choice questions followed by scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

skills.name: Able To Troubleshoot And Fault Find

e85be1b9-2000-47b5-a3b9-fcc4e626313f.description: Earners of the Hansen OM Certified Developer badge understand how to set up their development environment, write SOI adaptors using the Technical Integration Framework, use the event store and services, develop plugins for a given requirement, use logs and identify the key elements of the Hansen OM APIs.
e85be1b9-2000-47b5-a3b9-fcc4e626313f.name: Hansen OM Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen OM Certified Developer course. This included the following topics: Solution Architecture, Integration, End to End flow, Deployment Architecture, APIs, setting up of OM standalone development environment, developing SOI adaptors using the technical integration framework, event store and services, plugins and logging; task demonstrations and practical exercises.
Successfully completed the Hansen OM Developer Exam. This consists of a multiple-choice section followed by a series of scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

90ea8eb6-b11f-45e9-aa3a-7c7ebac21882.description: Hansen Catalog Certified Developers have a good understanding of how to extend the functionality and integration of your Hansen Catalog through the Workflow Designer, APIs and XSLT.
90ea8eb6-b11f-45e9-aa3a-7c7ebac21882.name: Hansen Catalog Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Catalog Developer online course or instructor-led course.  This included a detailed, practice-based application of Workflow design using the Catalog Workflow Designer; XSLT creation and publication; and Catalog-specific API structures, endpoints and responses.

Successfully completed the Hansen Catalog Developer Certification exam.  This is a time-limited three hour exam which consists of a multiple choice section followed by a series of scenario-based practical tasks.

d144341f-322c-48e1-8912-4e26c60bef2e.description: Earners of the Hansen Portfolio Fundamentals badge are able to navigate the Hansen Portfolio user interface, execute queries to view the customer portfolio and edit customer portfolio items, create a snapshot of the customer portfolio and use it to rollback if needed, configure the Technical types for portfolio items, manage permissions for roles and groups to support application authorization, and manage the State Machine that supports the lifecycle of Portfolio items.
d144341f-322c-48e1-8912-4e26c60bef2e.name: Hansen Portfolio Fundamentals Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Portfolio Fundamentals Certification course.  This included the following topics:  viewing and editing Portfolio Items, creating snapshots, configuration management, authorisation management and state machine creation and amendment.

Successfully completed the Hansen Portfolio Fundamentals Certification exam.  This 3 hour exam consists of a set of multiple choice questions followed by scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

skills.name: Able To Troubleshoot And Fault Find

d44106d9-911d-4318-b7f2-831c5ae14e57.description: Hansen Catalog Certified Installers and Administrators have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the preparation, installation, configuration and maintenance of Hansen Catalog and Catalog Services.
d44106d9-911d-4318-b7f2-831c5ae14e57.name: Hansen Catalog Certified Installer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Catalog Installation and Administration online course or instructor-led course.  Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before installation; upload certificates and set security permissions; install, configure and test Hansen Catalog and Catalog Services; ensure the identity provider is appropriately configured; maintain the Catalog; and describe the upgrade process.
Successfully installed and tested Catalog and Catalog Services.

35d21ca0-00fb-4b3c-b4fe-cc18a6d78979.description: Hansen CPQ Certified Installers and Administrators have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the preparation, installation, configuration and maintenance of Hansen CPQ.
35d21ca0-00fb-4b3c-b4fe-cc18a6d78979.name: Hansen CPQ Certified Installer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen CPQ Installation and Administration online course or instructor-led course.  Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before installation; upload certificates and set security permissions; install, configure and test Hansen CPQ; ensure the identity provider is appropriately configured; maintain CPQ; and describe the upgrade process.
Successfully installed and tested Hansen CPQ.

e57ee238-014d-4629-9432-3002f9de38d1.description: Hansen Portfolio Certified Deployer and Administrator have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the preparation, installation, configuration and maintenance of Hansen Portfolio.
e57ee238-014d-4629-9432-3002f9de38d1.name: Hansen Portfolio Certified Deployer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Portfolio Deployer and Administration online course or instructor-led course. Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before installation; upload certificates and set security permissions; install, configure and test Hansen Portfolio; ensure the identity provider is appropriately configured; maintain Portfolio; and describe the upgrade process.
Successfully installed and tested Hansen Portfolio.

759d19a2-c186-439f-92d8-2155c8387760.description: Hansen Portfolio Certified Developers are able to describe the purpose and structure of the key Portfolio APIs and relevant endpoints, use Portfolio REST APIs for integration with upstream and downstream systems, use APIs to rollback the customer portfolio, use runtime events for asynchronous integration, explain how to import and export data, identify the key error codes and messages, and describe how you can change the log-back configuration for the application.
759d19a2-c186-439f-92d8-2155c8387760.name: Hansen Portfolio Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Portfolio Developer Certification course.  This included the following topics: using the Import/Export Tool;  Logback Configuration; Runtime Event Framework; REST APIs; and Data Models.

Successfully completed the Hansen Portfolio Developer Certification exam.  This 3 hour exam consists of a set of multiple choice questions followed by scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

skills.name: Able To Troubleshoot And Fault Find

fd1c7982-de91-40fe-92f4-645cc0cda831.description: Hansen Catalog Certified Deployer and Administrators have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the preparation, Deployment, configuration and maintenance of Hansen Catalog on AWS cloud native platform.
fd1c7982-de91-40fe-92f4-645cc0cda831.name: Hansen Catalog Certified Deployer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Catalog Deployment and Administration online course or instructor-led course. Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: verify and review the pre-requisites for Hansen Catalog Cloud Native Deployment, understand and perform the flow of Cloud Native Deployment process, review setup of Cognito, API Gateway, Route53, and Ingress Routing, configure External Secrets, Configure the application Properties and Install Catalog Microservices and verify the Deployment.
Successfully deployed and tested Catalog on AWS cloud native platform.

37761b8c-d011-4d86-a96d-f09df5978949.description: Hansen CPQ Certified Deployer and Administrators have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the deploying CPQ on AWS EKS cluster and administering authorization on Mongo DB Atlas cluster.
37761b8c-d011-4d86-a96d-f09df5978949.name: Hansen CPQ Certified Deployer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen CPQ Deployer and Administration online course or instructor-led course. Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before deploying Hansen CPQ; ensure Cognito and API gateway are appropriately configured and deploy CPQ mandatory plugins.
Successfully deployed and tested Hansen CPQ.

8fac10c3-097d-4830-8f0d-4e1b622267d6.description: Hansen OM Certified Installers and Administrators have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the preparation, installation, configuration and maintenance of Hansen Order Manager.
8fac10c3-097d-4830-8f0d-4e1b622267d6.name: Hansen OM Certified Installer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen OM Installation and Administration online course or instructor-led course. Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before installation; upload certificates and set security permissions; install, configure and test Hansen OM; ensure the identity provider is appropriately configured; maintain OM; and describe the upgrade process.
Successfully installed and tested Hansen OM.

902bd809-f4a7-4480-bdb6-191a38e253e1.description: Hansen Provision Certified Developers can configure, develop, test and troubleshoot Hansen Provision components including technology cartridges, topology and service delivery platforms.
902bd809-f4a7-4480-bdb6-191a38e253e1.name: Hansen Provision Certified Developer

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Provision Certified Developer course.  This included the following topics:  Developer tools and troubleshooting;  JMF overview; Service Definitions; Technology Cartridges; Topology Configuration; Service Delivery Platform;  Technology Impact configuration;  JMF expressions; Order API; and deploying changes as patches.
Successfully completed the Hansen Provision Developer Exam.  This consists of a multiple-choice section followed by a series of scenario-based practical tasks to test applied knowledge.

955ed3df-2e9c-4b61-b4e9-d9b9bdc663e0.description: Hansen OM Certified Deployer and Administrator have completed hands-on guided walkthrough of the configuration, deployment and maintenance of Hansen OM system on AWS Kubernetes (K8S) cluster, along with setting up Postgres SQL Server (RDS) on Hansen CSD Cloud Native Eco-system.
955ed3df-2e9c-4b61-b4e9-d9b9bdc663e0.name: Hansen OM Certified Deployer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen OM Deployment instructor-led course. Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before installation; upload certificates and set security permissions; install, configure and test Hansen OM; ensure the identity provider is appropriately configured; maintain OM, and describe the upgrade process.
Successfully deployed and tested Hansen OM.

d0bf8d0b-bbf8-4c4d-9cda-e14aa06bba64.description: Hansen Provision Certified Installers and Administrators have completed a hands-on guided walk-through of the preparation, installation, configuration and maintenance of Hansen Provision.
d0bf8d0b-bbf8-4c4d-9cda-e14aa06bba64.name: Hansen Provision Certified Installer and Administrator

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Hansen Provision Installation and Administration online course or instructor-led course.  Demonstrated an ability to complete the following: outline the hardware and software requirements that must be in place and configured before installation; upload certificates and set security permissions; install, configure and test Hansen Provision; ensure the identity provider is appropriately configured; maintain Provision; and describe the upgrade process.
Successfully installed and tested Hansen Provision.
